CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Interracial Picnic - Members of the Interracial Action Council went swimming in county's 'Catfish Run' pool at South Park in a precedent-shattering move, Saturday. They paused on the brink just before diving into the water."
TitMainTitle: Three men and four women, members of the Interracial Action Council, standing at edge of "Catfish Run" swimming pool with flagstone ledge at South Park
CatSubject_tab: Swimming pools--Pennsylvania--South Park.Men--Pennsylvania--South Park.Women--Pennsylvania--South Park.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
